comments.html: I'm not joking about the master of procrastination thing. :)

Hello Rach, this is a terrific site for trying out programming fonts:

https://www.programmingfonts.org/

My current favourite is Recursive. Check out its excellent website:

https://www.recursive.design/

oh no, what have you done to me? What a great site
Whoa. Recursive is amazing. I'm not sure I like the more curly ends of the spectrum, but the flexibility is astonishing. I didn't know some many fine gradations was possible in one font. Thank you.
